00027 #include "MsqFPE.hpp"

00031 
00032 /* First check for BSD-style fpsetmask, which is the closest
00033    to a standard across unix-like OSs */
00034 
00035 #if defined (HAVE_FPSETMASK)
00036 
00037 #include <ieeefp.h>
00038 
00039 bool MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::fpe_trap_supported()
00040   { return true; }
00041 
00042 int MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::get_current_fpe_state()
00043   { return fpgetmask(); }
00044 
00045 void MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::set_current_fpe_state(int state)
00046   { fpsetmask( state ); }
00047 
00048 void MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::enable_trap_fpe()
00049   { fpsetmask( fpgetmask()|FP_X_INV|FP_X_OFL|FP_X_DZ ); }
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053 
00054 
00055 /* Next try GNU-C feenableexcept mechanism */
00056 
00057 #elif defined (HAVE_FEENABLEEXCEPT)
00058 
00059 #ifndef _GNU_SOURCE
00060 #  define MSQ_SET_GNU_SOURCE
00061 #  define _GNU_SOURCE
00062 #endif
00063 #include <fenv.h>
00064 #ifdef MSQ_SET_GNU_SOURCE
00065 #  undef _GNU_SOURCE
00066 #  undef MSQ_SET_GNU_SOURCE
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 
00070 bool MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::fpe_trap_supported() 
00071   { return true; }
00072 
00073 int MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::get_current_fpe_state()
00074   { return fegetexcept(); }
00075 
00076 void MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::set_current_fpe_state(int state)
00077   { feenableexcept( state ); }
00078 
00079 void MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::enable_trap_fpe()
00080 { 
00081   const int flags = FE_DIVBYZERO|FE_INVALID|FE_OVERFLOW;
00082   feclearexcept( flags );
00083   feenableexcept( flags );
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 
00088 
00089 
00090 /* Next try Microsoft */
00091 
00092 #elif defined (_MSC_VER)
00093 
00094 #include <float.h>
00095 
00096 bool MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::fpe_trap_supported() 
00097   { return true; }
00098 
00099 int MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::get_current_fpe_state()
00100   { return _controlfp(0,0); }
00101 
00102 void MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::set_current_fpe_state(int state)
00103   { _controlfp( state, _MCW_EM ); }
00104 
00105 void MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::enable_trap_fpe()
00106 { 
00107   const int flags = _EM_ZERODIVIDE|_EM_INVALID|_EM_OVERFLOW;
00108   _controlfp( ~flags, _MCW_EM );
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 
00113 /* Unsupported platform */
00114 #else
00115 
00116 bool MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::fpe_trap_supported() 
00117   { return false; }
00118 
00119 int MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::get_current_fpe_state()
00120   { return 0; }
00121 
00122 void MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::set_current_fpe_state(int )
00123   { }
00124 
00125 void MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::enable_trap_fpe()
00126   { }
00127 
00128 #endif

00132 
00133 MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::MsqFPE( bool enabled ) : isEnabled( enabled )
00134 {
00135   if (isEnabled) 
00136   {
00137     prevState = get_current_fpe_state();
00138     enable_trap_fpe();
00139   }
00140 }
00141 
00142 MESQUITE_NS::MsqFPE::~MsqFPE( )
00143 {
00144   if (isEnabled)
00145   {
00146     set_current_fpe_state( prevState );
00147   }
00148 }
